loans.name: Heidy Francisca

texts.es: Heidy es una joven laboriosa de 21 años, soltera y con espíritu de superación, desde hace tres años impulso su negocio de venta de nacatamales, con ayuda de su mama quien le enseño la receta y le ayuda a preparar los alimentos. Ella solicita por cuarto ciclo el financiamiento de la institución porque desea aumentar la oferta de nacatamales, invirtiendo en la compra de maíz, carne, papa, tomate, arroz y tocino, y de esta manera satisfacer la alta demanda que existe por parte de sus clientes, con las ganancias del crédito anterior logro mejorar su casa en cuanto al techo y la ampliación de un cuarto, por otro lado una de sus nuevas metas es aumentar sus ganancias para emprender un nuevo negocio, el cual es tener su propia pulpería.
texts.en: Heidy is a hardworking, 21-year-old single woman with a spirit for self-improvement. Three years ago she started her business selling nacatamales (a dish of maize, meat and rice wrapped in a banana leaf) with the help of her mother, who taught her the recipe and helped her prepare the dish. She is applying for her fourth loan cycle through the financing institution because she wishes to increase her supply of nacatamales, investing in the purchase of maize, meat, potatoes, tomato, rice and bacon and in this way satisfying the high existing demand from her customers. With the profits earned through her previous loan she was able to improve her house with regard to the roof and the expansion of a room. One of her new aims is to increase her profits to start a new business, which would be her own grocery store.

loans.use: to buy maize, meat, potatoes, tomatoes, rice and bacon

loans.name: Santo Tomas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario santo tomas ha mostrado ser un grupo organizado, exitoso y responsable cumplido con los pagos de sus créditos anteriores, el grupo lo coordina doña Zela una señora laboriosa y activa de 64 años de edad, soltera y madre de dos hijos independientes; Ella se dedica desde hace siete años a la venta de ropa en su domicilio y su nuera le ayuda a ofrecer productos de manera ambulante, solicita por catorceava vez el financiamiento de la institución porque desea expandir su negocio por medio de la inversión de más productos como camisas, pantalones, chores y faldas, con el crédito anterior logro comprar una computadora y materiales de construcción para edificar su propia tienda. Lucia de 66 años de edad y Ángela de 34 años de edad, también se dedican a la comercialización de ropa y la cuarta socia es lesbia de 34 años quien es propietaria de una pulpería.
texts.en: The solidarity group Santo Tomas has shown itself to be an organized, successful and responsible group, making the payments on its previous loans. The group is coordinated by Zela, a hard-working and active woman, 64 years old, single, and the mother of two independent children. She has worked for seven years selling clothing in her home and her daughter-in-law helps her to sell as a street vendor. She asks for the fourteenth time for a loan from the institution because she wants to expand her business through the investment in more products such as shirts, pants, shorts, and skirts. With the previous loan, she managed to purchase a computer and construction materials to build her own store. Lucia, 66 years old, and Ángela, 34 years old, also work selling clothing and the fourth member is lesbia, 34 years old, who is the owner of a general store.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, shorts, and skirts.

loans.name: Vilma Judith

texts.es: Vilma de 38 años de edad, reside en compañía de su familia en San Jacinto un municipio del departamento de Bolívar, ella es una apasionada por la modistería y logró incorporarse en una institución del estado en donde aprendió a confeccionar con todas las técnicas existentes y ha continuado capacitándose para hacer de  su confección un negocio muy prospero.  Cuenta con amplia clientela a quienes confecciona todo tipo de prenda de vestir, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, uniformes de colegios, entre otros, sus clientes se han mantenido fieles con el pasar del tiempo, pues brinda un excelente servicio con las respectivas garantías de sus productos. Vilma con su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado dotar su taller con las herramientas necesarias para una producción de calidad, sin embargo su capacidad se ha quedado agotada con la creciente demanda y desea invertir en materias primas y una maquina plana para aprovechar el incremento en la temporada que se aproxima, por lo que está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en su proyecto de fortalecimiento de su infraestructura técnica. Esta inversión será de mucho éxito y beneficio para su familia.  Su meta a futuro es tener un local donde comercializar sus diseños.
texts.en: Vilma is 38 years old and lives with her family in San Jacinto, a municipality in the department of Bolivar. She is passionate about the dressmaking business and was able to join a state institution where she learned to make clothing using all of the existing techniques and has continued training herself to make a successful business out of her creations. She has the support of many clients for whom she makes all types of clothing, including shirts, pants, dresses, and school uniforms, among others. Her clients have remained loyal with the passage of time, because she provides an excellent service with respective guarantees on her products. Vilma, through her efforts and dedication, has managed to equip her shop with the tools necessary for quality production. However, her capacity has been exhausted due to growing demand and she wishes to invest in raw materials and a machine in order to take advantage of increasing demand in the upcoming season. For this reason, she is applying for a Kiva loan, which is her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, in order to invest in her project for strengthening her technical infrastructure. This investment will be very successful and will benefit her family. Her goal for the future is to have a store in which she sells her designs.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials and a machine

loans.name: Unidos Por La Fuerza Y La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Norma Orla, tiene 35 años de edad, tiene dos pequeños hijos. Ella forma parte del grupo "Unidos por la Fuerza y la Esperanza", que está formado por siete socios, todos ellos con un negocio propio.
Norma Orla se dedica desde año  y medio a la compra y venta de prendas de vestir en especial para damas y niños. Paralelamente a ésta actividad ella trabaja como niñera cuando la solicitan, es  gracias a éste trabajo que pudo juntar un pequeño capital para poder invertir en un poco de ropa y poder venderlo. Ella ofreció sus prendas a sus familiares y amigos y fue así que poco a poco fue haciéndose clientela.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para damas y niños.
texts.en:
Norma Orla, aged 35, has two young children. She is a part of the group "Unidos por la Fuerza y la Esperanza", which is made up of seven members, all of whom own their own business.

Norma Orla has worked for the past year and a half buying and selling articles of clothing especially for women and children.

Alongside this, she works as a nanny when needed. It is thanks to this work that she was able put together a small amount of money to be able to invest in some clothing to sell on. She offered her garments to her friends and relatives and this was how she slowly built up her clientele.

This loan will be used to invest in articles of clothing for ladies and children.

loans.use: to invest in women and children's clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in electric wires, power outlets, a breaker box, etc. to install electricity since the zone where she lives is very dangerous.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica de 62 años de edad es madre soltera que vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus dos hijos mayores de edad los que le apoyan con los gastos de su hogar, además vive con ellos la esposa de uno de sus hijos. Angélica se dedica a la crianza y venta de gallinas actividad que realiza desde hace ya 8 años, por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes que la prefieren por la calidad de sus productos. La vivienda en la que vive Angélica está hecha de madera, pero con el tiempo algunas de las tablas de madera sean deteriorado, por lo que ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: tablas de madera, clavos y alambre para reparar su vivienda y que esta la proteja en el invierno.
texts.en: Angélica is 62 years old and is a single mother. She lives in her own house together with her two adult children, who help her with living expenses. Her son's wife also lives with them. Angélica makes a living raising and selling chickens, an activity that she has done for the past 8 years and with which she has many customers who prefer the quality of her products. Her home is made of wood, but with the passage of time some of the planks of wood have deteriorated, and for this reason she is applying for a loan through FUSAI to invest in wood planks, nails, and wire to repair her home so that it provides protection in the winter.

loans.use: to invest in wood planks, nails and wire to repair her house so that it provides protection in the winter

loans.name: Khaleel

texts.en:
Khaleel is 26 years old and lives in Gaza with his wife; he has two children in Gaza. He has been working at his small food shop selling frozen foods.

His family has been affected by the last war in Gaza and his house partly destroyed, so he applied for a loan request to rebuild the bathroom, the kitchen, and to paint the house again.

He hopes to be able provide his children with the best life conditions; he is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to rebuild the bathroom, the kitchen, and to paint the house again.

loans.name: Simon Judas

texts.es:
El señor  Simón de 56  años de edad  vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación, se dedica al negocio que es la venta de  marisco desde hace 21 años y  sus clientes son los vecinos de la hermana república del Salvador.
Don Simón está solicitando el préstamo para compra de mariscos como camarones, curiles y algunos pescados, también  posee una lancha de pesca. Con las ganancias y el apoyo de este préstamo  desea salir adelante y seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
Uno de sus sueños es  mejorar más sus ingresos y también su vivienda.

San Lorenzo,  Honduras  - Agosto del 2015
texts.en:
Simón, 56 years old, lives with his wife in his home. He has worked at his business, which is selling seafood, for 21 years and his customers are the neighbors of the sister country of El Salvador.

Simón is asking for the loan to purchase seafood such as shrimp, curiles [bivalve mollusks], and some fish, and also he has a fishing boat. With the earnings and the support from this loan, he wants to get ahead and continue improving his income.

One of his dreams is to improve his income more and also his house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - August 2015

loans.use: to purchase shrimp, curiles [bivalve mollusk], and some fish for his business.

loans.name: Bahaa' Al-Deen

texts.en:
Bahaa' Al-Deen is 19 years old; he lives in Gaza with his small family. One year ago he started trading the birds; it’s a good business, but still needs a lot of improvement.

He applied for this youth loan to buy different kinds of birds per customer requests, cages and food for them, which will increase his income, helping him to improve the financial conditions for his family.

Bahaa' Al-Deen is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy different kinds of birds, per customer’s requests, cages, and food for them, which will increase his income.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Rosa Salvaje Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Rosa Salvaje está integrando por 3 mujeres quienes día a día trabajan fuertemente para sacar adelantes a sus familias, sintiéndose orgullosas de poder tener sus propios negocios y obtener ingresos económicos para prosperar en la vida. El grupo lo coordina doña Liliam de  60 años, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado de manera ambulante desde hace cinco años y solicita por tercer vez el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de camisas, licras, pantalones, chores y sandalias. Uno de sus logros con los créditos anteriores fue ofertar más productos. La segunda socia es la joven Heyra de 23 años de edad quien se dedica a la venta de pan y refresco, la tercer socia es Rosibel de 18 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en: The solidarity group Rosa Salvaje is comprised of 3 women who each day work hard to improve the lives of their families, feeling pride in their ability to have their own businesses and obtain a living to prosper in life. The group is coordinated by 60-year-old Liliam. She has made a living selling clothing and shoes as a street vendor for the past five years and is applying for her third cycle of financing with the institution in order to buy shirts, Spandex, pants, shorts, and sandals. One of her goals with her previous loans was to offer more products. The second member is Heyra, a young woman who is 23 years old and who makes a living selling bread and drinks. The third member is Rosibel, who is 18 years old and makes a living selling clothing.

loans.use: to buy shirts, Spandex, pants, shorts, and sandals

loans.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario esperanza  está conformado por tres mujeres emprendedoras coordinado por Elizabeth de 53 años de edad, soltera y madre de tres hijos independientes, ella emprendió su negocio hace 18 años  el cual es la venta de ropa y perfumes, uno de sus hijos le ayuda a vender en la universidad y de esta manera aumentan las ganancias, solicita por doceavo ciclo el financiamiento en la institución para la compra de perfumes, cremas, blusas y pantalones para aumentar la cantidad de productos que se le ofrecen a los clientes; uno de sus logros con el crédito anterior fue mejorar su vivienda. La segunda socia es Ana de 45 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y la tercer socia es doña Josefa de 46 años, se dedica a la veta de ropa y perfumes.
texts.en: The solidarity group Esperanza is made up of three entrepreneurial women coordinated by Elizabeth, who is 53 years old, single and the mother of three independent children. She began her business selling clothing and perfumes 18 years ago. One of her children helps her make sales in the university and in this way she has increased profits. She is applying for her second cycle of financing through the institution to buy perfumes, creams, blouses and pants to increase the quantity of products that she offers to her customers. One of her goals with her previous loan was to improve her home. The second member is Ana, who is 45 years old and makes a living selling used clothing. The third member is Josefa, who is 46 years old and works selling clothing and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, blouses and pants

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in corn wholesale, lime, and other products she needs to improve her business.

loans.name: Boer Ii Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Boer II está conformado por un microempresario emprendedor y dos mujeres laboriosas, quienes trabajan día a día para sacar adelante sus negocios, el grupo es coordinado por doña Luz de 33 años de edad, soltera y madre de un niño de siete años quien es su mayor motivación, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y tortillas y solicita el financiamiento en la institución porque desea invertir en la compra de camisas, pantalones, maíz y leña. El segundo socio es don Jairo de 36 años quien es propietario de un taller de costura y la tercer socia es Juana de 24 años de edad quién se dedica a la venta de zapatos y chinelas.
texts.en:
The group "Boer Ii" is comprised of an enterprising small businessman and two industrious women, who work every day to build their businesses.

The group is coordinated by Luz, who is 33 years old, single, and mother of one son of 7 years old who is her greatest motivation. She makes a living selling clothing and tortillas and she is requesting financing because she wants to invest in the purchase of shirts, pants, corn, and firewood.

The other partners are 36 year old Jairo who owns a sewing workshop and 24 year old Juana who works in the sale of shoes and slippers.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, corn, and firewood.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanas en una zona rural del distrito de Chiclayo que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Luis se dedica a dar servicios de transporte publico en su taxi, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 01 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la reparacion y mantenimiento de su vehículo ya que se encuentra en mal estado. Con esto Luis espera ofrecer un mejor servicios a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 26 years old, single, and lives with his parents and sisters in a rural zone in the district of Chiclayo, Lambayeque, on the north coast of Peru. People living in this region typically make a living from agriculture, farming and small businesses.

Luis makes a living offering transport services with his taxi, his business is well located in his own home. He has been doing this work for one year so far, and he has received excellent personal and professional references in this time.

The loan Luis is seeking will be used to repair and work on his car, which is in a state of disrepair. In this way, Luis will be able to offer better services to his customers which will allow him to increase his earnings and thus improve his and his family's lives.

loans.use: o repair and work on his car, which is in a state of disrepair.

loans.name: Shireen

texts.en:
Shireen is a 26-year-old married woman from Jabalia city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12-16 hours a day regularly. She lives with her Husband and one child in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, her husband earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.

Because she is not able to save enough money, Shireen took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, she will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive and inefficient. This will help her to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Tamam

texts.en:
Tamam is a 26-year-old married woman from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip and suffers from power outages 12-16 hours a day regularly. She lives with her husband and one child in a small house. As an employee in the public sector, her husband earns a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.

Because she is not able to save enough money, Tamam took a USD loan from FATEN. With this loan, she will buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. Palestinians use water boilers that use either gas or gasoline to heat the water before a shower, which can be dangerous, expensive and inefficient. This will help her to provide hot water without using electricity, which is much more expensive.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Jose Rolando

texts.es: José de 38 años de edad vive desde hace 1 año en casa de su propiedad, con su compañera de vida y su hija de 9 meses de edad. José se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, actividad que le permite sostener la economía de su hogar, además vende diversidad de artículos varios de forma ambulante. El servicio sanitario de la vivienda de José se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que el buscando mantener la sanidad de su hogar, ha decidido repararlo, además desea construir una galera para su venta de pollos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y lámina galvanizada para reparar el servicio sanitario de su vivienda.
texts.en: José, 38, has lived in his own house for one year with his spouse and their 9 month old daughter. José is dedicated to raising and selling chicken, work that allows him to support his family economically. Additionally, he sells various items on foot. The bathroom in José's house is deteriorating so, looking to keep up the  health of his home, he has decided to repair it. He also wishes to build a galley for his poultry sales so he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and galvanized sheets to repair his home's bathroom.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and galvanized sheets to repair the bathroom in his house.

loans.name: Bendecidos Por Dios Group

texts.es:
Lola Leila, tiene 51 años de edad, tiene dos hijo adultos quienes hoy en día son su apoyo. Ella forma parte del grupo "Bendecidos por Dios", que está formado por cinco socias.
Desde hace mas de diez años Lola Leila se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por medio de catálogos y paralelo a éste negocio presta servicio de masajes.
Poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos para poder brindarles estudios y las necesidades básicas de una persona.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza para la venta así como también invertirá en la compra de las cremas que utiliza para el servicio de masajes.
texts.en:
Lola Leila, 51, has two adult children who are now her support. She is part of the Bendecidos por Dios group, which has five members. For over ten years Lola Leila has sold beauty products through catalogs, and along with this business she offers massages.
Little by little, and with a great deal of effort, she has been able to raise her children to provide them with an education and all the basic necessities.
She will use the loan to purchase beauty products to sell, and she will also purchase creams which she uses for her massage service.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of beauty products.

loans.name: Thérèse Alice

texts.fr:
54 ans, mariée, Thérèse Alice est une femme débrouillarde et persistante. Elle est mère de deux enfants de 13 et 15 ans, ces derniers sont tous scolarisés dans une école privée.
Son mari vend des charbons en bois et elle vend des volailles il y a maintenant 5 ans. Elle a déjà essayé beaucoup d'autres affaires auparavant mais tous ceux-ci ne lui portaient pas assez de bénéfices, à savoir vente des chaussures à l'occasion, vente des vêtements etc...
Son objectif est de développer son activité, afin de pouvoir augmenter son revenu pour qu'elle puisse continuer à scolariser ses enfants jusqu'à l'université. Elle voudrait aussi prévoir dès maintenant sa retraite  et celle de son mari. Les deux époux se soutiennent bien mutuellement et réciproquement dans l'exercice de leurs activités pour le bien-être de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
54 years old, married, Thérèse Alice is a resourceful and persistent woman. She is the mother of two children aged 13 and 15, they are enrolled in a private school.

Her husband sells charcoal and she has been selling poultry for 5 years now. She has already tried many other business ventures before but all of these were not providing her with enough profit, such as selling second-hand shoes, selling clothes, etc...

Her goal is to develop her activity, so as to increase her income to be able to continue to send her children to school up to university. She would also like to plan for her and her husband's retirement from now. The two spouses mutually and reciprocally support each other in carrying out their activities for their children's well-being.

loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Doña Norma tiene 70 años de edad, es viuda y madre de 4 hijos, a los cuales con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo logró darles el estudio a todos. Comerciante desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de electrodomésticos, ropa de cama, accesorios de decoración para el hogar y otros. Busca con su actividad productiva salir adelante como jefa de hogar, ser independiente económicamente y seguir ayudando ahora sus nietos. Ella es una clienta con amplia trayectoria en Fundación Mujer y excelente moral de pagos, gracias a los créditos anteriores y la buena gestión de los recursos ha logrado consolidar su negocio. El financiamiento actual le va a permitir comprar algunos electrodomésticos que ya le solicitaron sus clientes. Doña Norma es una mujer con gran espíritu de lucha, deseos de superarse y propiciar una mejor calidad de vida es por eso que sigue trabajando con mucha motivación y asegura que eso lo que la mantiene con muy buena salud.
texts.en: Norma is 70 years old. She is a widow and a mother of four children to whom, with a lot of work and effort, she managed to give an education. A trader for many years, she is dedicated to selling appliances, bed linens, decorative accessories for the home and other items. Through her work, she is looking to progress as head of the household, to be economically independent and to keep helping her grandchildren. She is a client with extensive experience with Fundacion Mujer and excellent payment morals. Thanks to the previous loans and the good management of resources she has managed to consolidate her business. The current loan is going to allow her to buy some appliances that her customers have already requested. Norma is a woman with a great spirit of working hard and a desire to progress and to win a better quality of life. So she keeps working with a lot of motivation and assures that this is what keeps her in very good health.

loans.use: to buy appliances to sell.

loans.name: Digna Alejandra

texts.es:
La joven Digna de 25  años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hijo  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 03  años al negocio de venta de tortillas, sus clientes son todos sus vecinos y amistades que la prefieren por su buena atención y su buen producto.
Digna vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo valle  al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Digna está solicitando el préstamo para compra de maíz y leña  que son los productos más necesarios para la elaboración de tortillas, con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente subsiguiente  con deseos de seguir trabajar con Prisma.
Su sueño es aumentar  su clientela para mejorar sus ingresos, y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras  -   Agosto del  2015.
texts.en:
Young Digna, 25, lives with her husband and their son in their own house. She has been dedicated to her business selling tortillas for three years. Her customers are all of her neighbors and friends who prefer her for her good attention and good product.

Digna lives in the city of San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. She is an entrepreneurial woman with desires to get ahead and work hard day after day to improve her quality of life.

Digna is requesting the loan to buy maize and wood which are the products most needed to make the tortillas. With the support of this loan, she intends to improve her income and also her quality of life. She is a former customer with a desire to keep working with Prisma

Her dream is to expand her customerbase to improve her income and, at the same time, improve her future alongside her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - August 2015

loans.use: to buy maize and wood for her business.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 24 years old, lives in a sector in Jordan called Ramtha, and is studying in a university majoring in law. He is a member of a big family. His father is retired with a low pension that is not enough to cover all the household expenses.

Lately his family has faced financial crises, preventing them from paying for Mohammad's university; therefore, he decided to apply for an educational loan to help him pay for his university fees and achieve his dreams to become a lawyer to help people who are oppressed.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees.

loans.name: Hélène

texts.fr:
60 ans, veuve depuis 10 ans, Hélène est une mère courageuse et battante. Elle a huit enfants dont 7 déjà mariés et la sixième, à cause de sa maladie (il y a déjà 15 ans) et le traitement qu'elle doit suivre habite avec Hélène. 
Hélène dirige un magasin général avec une petite gargote il y a maintenant 10 ans, avant le décès de son mari, elle était femme au foyer, mais depuis, elle devait travailler pour pouvoir élever, nourrir, vêtir et continuer à financer les études de ses enfants. C'était très dur pour elle. 
Actuellement, elle continue à travailler, à exploiter son activité et elle désire encore la développer et l'améliorer autant que possible pour pouvoir prévoir et assurer sa retraite.
texts.en:
60 years old, widowed for 10 years, Hélène is a brave and fighting mother. She has eight children of whom seven are already married. The sixth lives with Hélène, because of her illness (for 15 years already) and the treatment she must follow.

Hélène manages a general store with a small restaurant for ten years now. Before her husband's death, she was a housewife, but since then, she has had to work in order to take bring up, feed, clothe and continue to finance her children's studies. It was very difficult for her.

Currently, she continues to work, to operate her activity, and she still wishes to develop and improve it as much as possible to be able to plan and ensure her retirement.

loans.use: to buy various general merchandise: sugar, flour, fine salt, table oils, biscuits, soaps, etc...

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in brick, iron, gravel, cement, sand and labor to build a room in his parents' house.

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es: La Señora Arminda  de 39 años de edad vive en el  municipio de Monteagudo provincia Hernando Siles en la comunidad de Pucahuasi, vive en  domicilio propio junto a  su conyugue , su actividad de la cliente es la producción de miel de abejas de la cual ella  generara sus ingresos, tiene dos dependientes, la señora presenta un nivel de instrucción primaria, la señora Arminda es muy responsables con sus actividades. La señora Arminda requiere un préstamo que destinara para la compra de más cajas de abeja para así poder impulsar su producción de miel de abejas, también para compra de insumos para apicultura con el fin de poder ser una emprendedora exitosa para así producir en cantidades mayores y también poder sacar sus derivados como ser propoleo y otros que le permitirán satisfacer todas las demandas de su futura clientela y le permitan crecer en lo económico, personal como profesional en la producción de miel de abejas
texts.en:
Arminda, aged 39, lives in the town of Monteagudo, in the Hernando Siles Province, which is in the community of Pucahuasi. She lives in her own home with her partner.

She produces honey from bees, which is how she earns her income, as she has two dependents. Arminda has had primary education, and is very responsible with her work.

She requires a loan which she will use to buy more boxes for the bees, so that she can boost the production of honey. She will also buy other beekeeping supplies to become a successful businesswoman, buy producing higher quantities, and also extracting derivatives, such as propolis and others, which will allow her to meet all the demands of her future clientele, and to grow economically, professionally and personally with her honey production.

loans.use: to buy beekeeping supplies to expand her honey business and generate more income for her family.

loans.name: Wilder Franklin

texts.es:
Wilder tiene 33 años de edad, tiene hogar estable, vive al lado de su conyuge y una hija de 2 años y medio, cliente es nacido y criado es distrito Santo Tomas, tiene casa propia de material rustico un piso en caserio Lungutay del Distrito Santo Tomas. Moradores del distrito se dedicadan basicamente a la ganaderia y agricultura (cultivo de café maiz, papa, camote, vituca y menestras), dicho distrito se encuentra ubicado en la Provincia de cutervo, region Cajamarca, Sierra norte de Perú.

Wilder se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 11 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona, tambien cultiva café variedad catimor en el Caserio El Porvenir del Distrito Santo Tomas, a la fecha tiene 1 has en producción. Producto vende a compradores mayoristas de la zona quue luego vende en la ciudad de Jaen.El destino del crédito sera para compra de una cabeza de ganado vacuno y sanidad del mismo para engorde y luego de ello sacarlo ha la venta. Con esto Wilder espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Wilder is 33 years old. She has a stable home, lives with her partner and their 21/2 year old daughter. He was born and raised in the Santo Tomas district, he owns his house, which is made of rustic material, a single story home in Lungutay in the Santo Tomas district. The inhabitants in this area work primarily in livestock and agriculture (growing coffee, corn, potatoes, sweet potatoes, vituca, and legumes.) Said district is located in the province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. Wilder works raising cattle, he has over 11 years of experience and he has very good personal and professional references in the area. He also grows coffee, the catimor variety,  and he currently has 1 Hectare in production in El Porvenir. He sells this product wholesale to clients in the zone of Jaen.  The purpose of this loan is to buy a head of cattle for cattle rearing and fattening to then sell it. With this, Wilder hopes to offer better quality coffee to his clients, which will have a positive impact in his earnings and will improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy a head of cattle for cattle rearing and fattening, then to sell it.

loans.name: Ludivina

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Ludivina works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Ludivina is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her fishing/fish vending business.

Ludivina has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is 53 years old and lives in Baqaa. She is a married woman and has two children; one of them is Ayat, who is studying psychology. Ayat appears in the photo instead of her mother because she is a conservative woman.

Ayat is 21 years old, and she finished her third year in university with good marks. Maryam wants the best for her daughter; she is the older one, and she wants to see her be a successful woman in the future. She wants to let her to be a productive woman and depend on herself. But her income is not enough to cover her daughter's education fees, so she applied for an education loan to help her cover Ayat's semester fees.

loans.use: to cover her daughter's semester fees.

loans.name: Darlie

texts.en:
Darlie is 57 years old and married with four children. Darlie works very hard to provide for them.

Darlie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, canned goods, cooking oil, etc., to sell.

Darlie has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, canned goods, cooking oil, etc.

Darlie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, canned goods, cooking oil, etc., to sell.

loans.name: Binisin Group

texts.fr:
Aissata est la dame qui a  tendu sa main sur la photo, elle est une  malienne âgée de 54 ans, mère de sept (07) enfants âgés de huit (08) à vingt(20) ans dont un scolarisé. Fait de l’élevage depuis 25 ans.  Aissata fait recours au prêt de Réseau de Micro Institution de Croissance de Revenus(R.M.C.R) pour raison d' acheter des moutons pour  l’élevage. Elle fait des achats d’ovin dans le marché le plus proche de sa localité et revend dans le même marché. Ses bénéfices lui permettent de prendre certaines charges de la famille comme les frais de condiment et les petits besoin des enfants.
Le rêve d’ Aissata   est  avoir  des bénéfices pour  acheter une charrette à quatre(04) roux pour ses activités.
texts.en:
Aissata is the lady who raises her hand on the photo, she is a 54-year old Malian, mother of seven children aged 8 to 20 years, of whom one goes to school. She has been rearing livestock for 25 years.

Aissata is requesting a Réseau de Micro Institution de Croissance de Revenus (R.M.C.R) loan in order to purchase sheep for rearing. She purchases her livestock in the market closest to her locality and resells in the same market.

Her profits allow her to take charge of certain family expenses, like the purchase of condiments and the children's small needs. Aissata's dream is to make profits to but a four-wheeled cart for her activities.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to be sold afterwards.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 22-year-old, single man living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid. He is studying to get his bachelor's degree in economics, and he is now in his third year.

His father could not cover Ahmad's university fees because of the financial crisis that he is facing; therefore, Ahmad is applying for an educational loan to help him cover his semester fees. Ahmad's future plan is to work in the same field.

loans.use: to cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Gherson Manuel

texts.es:
Gherson Manuel tiene 23 años de edad, es un joven estudiante de la carrera de derecho, decidió por ésta carrera ya que le interesaba conocer los deberes, derechos y obligaciones que toda persona debe cumplir. Viene estudiando tres años y le falta para culminar un año y medio. Una de sus metas es postular al Poder Judicial para trabajar.
Actualmente trabaja en una Notaria como asistente de oficina lo cual le hará ganar experiencia.
Gherson Manuel está muy contento ya que gracias al préstamo recibido podrá realizar el pago de mensualidades de su universidad sin ningún problema y así estudiar sin contratiempos.
texts.en:
Gherson Manuel is 23 years old. He is a young student of law. He decided this course since it interested him to know the duties, rights and obligations that everyone must follow. He has been studying for three years and he has one and half years left. One of his goals is to apply to the Judiciary to work.

Currently, he works in a Notary as an office assistant which he will do to gain experience.

Gherson Manuel is very happy since, thanks to the loan received, he will be able to make the monthly university payments without any issues and thus study without delay.

loans.use: to invest in his monthly university payments.

loans.name: Psyche

texts.en:
Psyche is 39 years old and has four children. Psyche is married, and two of her children are currently in school.

Psyche is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Psyche requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Psyche has been in pig fattening for six years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Psyche would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 45 years old and married with three children. With two children currently in school, Rosita works very hard to provide for them.

Rosita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

Rosita has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, salt, dried fish, cooking oil, coffee, etc.

In the future, Rosita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Susan is 52 years old, and one of her children is still in school.

Susan has a general store business in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Susan has been in this business for five years. Susan would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Gina works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Gina is borrowing 13,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to puchase more boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Paso Firme Group

texts.es:
Gillian Noemi, tiene 31 años de edad, es soltera, no tiene hijos. Forma parte del grupo "Paso Firme" que está formado por cinco socios.
Gillian Noemi, se dedica desde hace cuatro años a la venta de productos de belleza por medio de catálogos, actividad que desarrolla de forma independiente y le permite conocer gente y ampliar así su cartera de clientes.
Al mismo tiempo trabaja como estilista en sus tiempos libres.
Poco a poco ha ido formando un capital y aumentando su stock de productos de belleza para poder atender inmediatamente los requerimientos de su clientes.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza y perfumes para aumentar su stock.
texts.en:
Gillian Noemi is 31 years old, single and has no children. She is part of the group "Paso Firme" that is made up of five members.

Gillian Noemi has been dedicated for four years to selling beauty products through catalogs, work that she developed in an independent manner and allows her to know people and expand her list of customers.

At the same time, she works as a stylist in her free time.

Little by little, she has been building capital and expanding her stock of beauty products to be able to tend to her customers' requirements immediately.

The loan received will be invested in the purchase of beauty products and perfumes to expand her stock.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of beauty products.

loans.name: Ramon Ernesto

texts.es: Ramón de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijastra el posee un negocio de venta de hotdog desde hace 13 años de manera ambulante en su carreton y tiene muy buena clientela, también posee un molino de nixtamal en su casa de habitación, el solicita nuevamente otro crédito comprar mas ingredientes para preparar los alimentos como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas,entre otros ingredientes y poder seguir con sus ventas ya que esa es su fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Ramon, who is 47 years old, lives in a house that he owns with his wife and his stepdaughter. He has owned a business selling hotdogs for 13 years as a street vendor in his cart, and he has a very good clientele. He also owns a grinder for boiled corn in his house. He is asking again for a loan to buy more ingredients to prepare the food, such as: bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, bologna, among other ingredients, and be able to continue with his sales, as this is his source of income.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, bologna, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials and gear for her business.

Rowena has been in this business for three years now.

Rowena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials and gear for her business.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 39 years old and has three children. Marilyn is married and her three children are in school.

Marilyn is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Marilyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Marilyn has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Junaire

texts.en:
Junaire is 32 years old and has three children, one of whom is in school. Junaire is married.

Junaire is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Junaire has been in the pig fattening business for 7 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing 18,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Corazon has been in this business for 7 years. She also earns income from food vending. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF.

She dreams of saving enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Helen has been in this business for 8 years. Helen earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Sharon is 33 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Sharon has a tailoring business in the Philippines. Sharon requested a PHP 23000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials like fabric, threads, needles, etc. for her business.

Sharon has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, Sharon would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials like fabric, threads, needles, etc. for her business

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Leonora works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Leonora is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, can goods, etc. for her food vending business.

Leonora has been sustaining her business activities through her previous five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, can goods, etc. for her food vending business

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en:
Marivel is 33 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marivel is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies needed to raise her pigs.

Marivel has been raising pigs for 16 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies needed to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 37 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur.

Merlyn has a business raising livestock in the Philippines. Merlyn requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Merlyn has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Merlyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 43 years old and married with ten children. With one child currently in school, Leonila works very hard to provide for them.

Leonila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like soft drinks, coffee, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cooking oil, sugar, etc. to sell.

Leonila has been in this business for 11 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, coffee, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cooking oil, sugar, etc. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Leonila would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items like soft drinks, coffee, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cooking oil, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto tiene 42 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y su hijo en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Callayuc que se encuentra ubicado en la región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Humberto se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 15 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de café así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Humberto espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Humberto, aged 42, lives with his partner and child in their own home, made from rustic materials, in the Callayuc district, which is in the region of Cajamarca, in the Northern Sierra of Peru. Life in this district is quiet, the population here principally work in agriculture, farming and commerce.

Humberto works in agriculture, specifically growing coffee. He has fifteen years' experience of this, and has very good professional and personal references in the area. The loan he is being given will be used to buy compost and fertilizers, so that he can adequately maintain his coffee crops, as well as for contracting labor for the harvest season.

With this, Humberto hopes to be able to offer a higher quality coffee to his customers which will have a positive impact on his level of income, and in turn, will improve his quality of life, and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers, so that he can adequately maintain his coffee crops

loans.name: Farruh

texts.ru: Фаррух умный и жизнелюбивый парень. Он всегда старается и он уверен в себе, что у него все получится. Ему 27 лет. Он молодой муж и отец двоих детей. Фаррух житель района Кубадиен. У него имеется  постоянный бизнес. Фаррух занимается монтажом записи свадьбы, день рождении и мероприятии, берет заказ и записывает запись на дисках.  Он планирует купить новый компьютер и новый принтер для распечатки для улучшения процесс работы. Его старый компьютер устарел и не на него работать не выгодно. С такими планами Фаррух обратился за кредитом.
texts.en: Farruh is an intelligent and cheerful guy. He always tries hard and believes in himself and that everything will work out. He is 27, a young husband and father of two children. He lives in the Qubadiyon region and has his own business putting together video montages for weddings, birthdays and events. He takes orders and saves the recordings to a disc. He is planning to buy a new computer and printer to improve his workflow. His old computer has gotten old and isn't good to work on anymore. With these plans in mind, Farruh is looking for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a new computer and printer for his video business

loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona, 37, is a married woman with seven children, five of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Mona has a buy and sell rubber strip business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 19 years. She requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more rubber strips to sell to her customers.

She has successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Mona would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber strips to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Praxedes

texts.en:
Praxedes is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Praxedes is 41 years old and has five children who are in school.

Praxedes has a general store business in the Philippines. Praxedes requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Praxedes has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Praxedes would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn works hard to support her family. Robelyn is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Robelyn requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like snack foods, candies, canned goods, juice, cereals, coffee, biscuits, etc. to sell.

Robelyn has been in this business for 3 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Robelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like snack foods, candies, canned goods, juice, cereals, coffee, biscuits, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ermilita

texts.en:
Ermilita is 50 years old and has two children. Ermilita is married and has one child who is still in school.

Ermilita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Ermilita requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ermilita has been raising pigs for 20 years, and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Ermilita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 46 years old and has two children. Mary Jane is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Mary Jane is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Mary Jane requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Mary Jane has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed one time in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Mary Jane would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.en:
Apolinaria works hard to support her family. Apolinaria is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. Apolinaria has been in this business for 7 years.

Apolinaria requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like sugar, cooking oil, flour, etc. for her food production business. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Apolinaria would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like sugar, cooking oil, four, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila works hard to support her family. Cirila is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fabric, threads, beads, etc. for her business. Cirila has been in this business for 24 years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Cirila would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fabric, threads, beads, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Lucela

texts.en:
Lucela is 61 years old and married. She works very hard to provide for her family. Lucela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store.

Lucela has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, juice, cereals, diapers, sanitary pads, soft-drinks, etc. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Lucela would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Teofila

texts.en:
Teofila is 62 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child who is still in school. Teofila is in the agricultural business, pig fattening, in the Philippines. Teofila requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Teofila has been in pig fattening for 6 years now and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials for her tailoring business. Zosima has been in this business for 30 years. She also earns more income from buying and selling frozen foods.

Zosima successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Zosima has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Estella

texts.en:
Estella is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Estella is 52 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Estella has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines. Estella requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell. She has been in this business for 3 years. Estella would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Stay Positive - N12Kp7Đsơnbsơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs Huệ is 62 years old and she is married, with two children. She has been working in agriculture, raising poultry for more than 10 years. Huệ lives in Bim Son town, a semi-urban town in the Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover, the market need is low in this region. And the income from her business is unstable because when some disease on poultry happens, they could die, which leaves her nothing to sell. So she will have trouble with her finances.

The main hardship that Huệ faces is lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

This is Huệ first loan with Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution. She hopes that this loan could improve her life standard.

She is the group leader of the "Stay Positive - N12KP7ĐSơnBSơn", which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Huệ hopes for her business to do well. She also hopes for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma offers a chainsaw servicing business in the town of Valencia, Bohol. This has been her business for three decades now; her husband is a farmer. Out of this business, she also supplies lumber for additional income.

She is asking a loan through CEVI to buy gasoline, a chainsaw and lumber.

Thelma hopes to expand her business so that she can buy healthy meals for her husband and herself, since her children are already adults.

She hopes to live in comfort in the future.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, a chainsaw and lumber.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline works hard to support her family. Jacqueline is married and has a frozen foods vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Jacqueline requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more packs of frozen foods to sell. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more packs of frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en:
Rodney is 21 years old and is second of three children in the family. His mother Ponciana supports the family through her fish vending business in the Philippines.

Rodney is studying for a Bachelor of Science in Criminology and is currently in the first of this four-year course.

Ponciana is borrowing PHP 4,870 to pay for tuition fees for her son Rodney for the first semester of the school 2015-16.

Rodney plans to graduate and be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 39 years old and has four children. Jocelyn is married and has three children who are currently in school.

Jocelyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jocelyn has been in raising pigs for two years, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Lane

texts.en:
Lane is 37 years old and has four children. Lane is married and has four children who are in school.

Lane is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Lane requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Lane has been raising pigs for 15 years, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Lane would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Vilma requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell to her customers.

Vilma has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ailyn

texts.en:
Ailyn is 29 years old and married with one child.

Ailyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Ailyn has been in pig fattening for one year now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Benita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell in her general store.

Benita earns more income from food vending. Benita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Enjoy Everyday - N4Đđồngqchính Group

texts.en:
Mrs Hiền is 31 years old and she is married. She has been working in agriculture, raising poultry, for six years.

Hiền lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in village; moreover the market need is low in this region. And the income from this business is unstable because when some disease on poultry happens, they could die, which leaves her nothing to sell. So she will be in financial trouble.

The main hardship that Hiền faces is a lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

In 2014, Hiền joined Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution to improve her business. Hiền has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Microfinance Institution.

She is the group leader of "Enjoy Everyday - N4ĐĐồngQChính", which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Hiền hopes to maintain a successful business. She also hopes for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: To purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de carpintería en el cual fabrica y vende variedad de hermosos, tiene 15 años de dedicarse al negocio muchas personas lo prefieren ya que él ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus muebles, el joven vive en casa porpia con sus padres y su hermano, el está  solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de madera, clavos, pega, barniz, junco y de más artículos que logren atraer a más clientes de tal forma que pueda logra su objetivo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The young man, whose face has been pixilated because he is 27 years old and lives in a high risk area, has a carpentry shop where he makes and sells a variety of beautiful furnishings. He has 15 years of experience in the business and many people prefer him as he offers quality furniture and good prices. This young man lives in his own home with his parents and brother. He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds and other items in order to attract more customers and obtain his goal of improving living conditions for himself and his family.
,

loans.use: to buy wood, nails, glue, varnish, reeds and other items.

loans.name: Paz De Maria

texts.es: Doña Paz de 49 años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol y tambien vende prodcutos de uso personal desde hace 9 años, gracias a su trabajo y la ayuda de su esposo pueden salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo pero no posee suficiente capital por esa razon solicita nuevamente un credito pero esta vez para la compra de polines, laminas y pago de mano de obra y asi poder tener una vivienda segura.
texts.en: Paz, 49, lives with her life partner in her own house.  She grows corn and beans and also has been selling personal care products for nine years.  Thanks to her work and help from her husband they are able to get ahead.  Her goal is to change the roof of the house but she does not have enough capital for the project.  Therefore she is requesting a new loan to buy beams, corrugated metal and to pay labor costs in order to have a safer home.

loans.use: To buy beams and corrugated metal, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: Abel de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijas, el se dedica desde hace 35 años al cultivo de maiz, frijol y maicillo, vende sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de abonos, fertilizantes y mano de obra y asi seguir con sus siembras para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Abel, 45, lives in his own house with his wife and three daughters.  For 35 years he has been growing corn, beans and millet.  He sells his produce in the neighboring villages and, through his earnings, is able to get ahead.

He is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers, and to pay labor costs so he can continue planting crops and earn a better income.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 37 years old, married, and has three children. 

She owns and operates a transportation business and she provides safe transportation services to local community members. She has been in the business for five years and earns 8,000 PHP per month. 

Through GDMPC she recently borrowed a loan to be used to repaint her motorcycle and buy a new brake pad and accessories for her motorcycle to provide safe travel for customers. Tessie's plan is to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to repaint her motorcycle and buy a new brake pad and accessories for her motorcycle

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita tiene 41 años de edad, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Margarita se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que solicita será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como gallinas, patos, pavos, pollos, entre otros, así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Margarita espera ofrecer un mejor producto a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir generar mayores ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Margarita is 41 years old, married and lives with her husband and children in a rural area of the district of Cayaltí which is located in the province of Chiclayo, region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.  The local villagers work mainly in agriculture, livestock farming and commerce.

Margarita raises and sells small animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, etc., working from her home. She has been in business for five years and has very good personal and work references in the area.  The loan she is requesting is to buy more animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, chickens, etc. and balanced animal feed.  This will help Margarita to offer a better product to her customers which will increase her income, improve her earnings and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy more animals.

loans.name: Turaje Group

texts.fr:
Manassé fait parti du groupe Turaje, et habite  à Gitega. Il a 43 ans et est marié à Chantal, une cultivatrice. Ensemble, ils ont 6 enfants, tous étudient. 

Il est commerce du haricot, du riz, du sucre,…depuis 15 ans.

Il est à son quatrième crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit de Kiva, il va augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de  riz, de  haricot et de  sucre à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Manassé is a member of the group called Turaje and lives in Gitega. He is 43 years old and married to Chantal, a farmer. Together they have six children, all enrolled in school. He has been selling dried beans, rice, sugar, etc. for 15 years.

Manassé is on his fourth loan with Turame. With the Kiva loan, he is going to grow his working capital and buy a big quantity of rice, dried beans, and sugar for resale so as to earn more.

loans.use: to grow his working capital and buy a large quantity of rice, dried beans, and sugar for resale so as to earn more.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es viuda tiene 67 años de edad, recibe pensión mensualmente, pero esta no le alcanza por lo que  aparte trabaja como empleada domestica tres días de la semana. Necesita someterse a una cirugía para que puedan extirparle las cataratas que padece. Ella quiere volver a trabajar y hacer las cosas que hacia antes, cuidar a sus nietos, cosa que ahora no puede hacer.
texts.en:
She is a 67 year old widow. She receives a monthly pension. but it is not enough. Therefore, she works as a domestic employee three days a week.

She needs to have surgery remove the cataracts that she has. She wants to return to work and do things like she did before and to care for her grandchildren, which she cannot now do.

loans.use: to pay for ophthalmic treatment.

loans.name: Amormia

texts.en:
Amormia is 33 years old, married, and has two children.

Amormia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory to sell in her general store.

Amormia has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before requesting this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns income from vegetable vending.

Amormia aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory to sell in her general store

loans.name: Gladis Arely

texts.es: Gladis de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella tiene un pequeño chalet ubicado cerca de un centro educativo en una zona muy transitada desde hace varios años, tiene muchos clientes especialmente los alumnos del centro educativo, ella solicita nuevamente un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería como golosinas, galletas, dulces, refrescos, gaseosas, etc. todo por mayor y asi seguir con sus ventas para tener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Gladis, 42, lives in her own house with her life partner and son.  She runs a small stall near an education center in a very busy area where she has worked for several years.  She has many customers, especially students.  

She is requesting a new loan to buy more wholesale goods such as sweets, cookies, soft drinks, sodas, etc. to continue her sales activity and earn more profit.

loans.use: To buy more wholesale goods such as sweets, cookies, soft drinks, sodas, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El es un joven casado y tiene 26 años de edad, su ocupación es técnico electromecánico, por muchos años  ha tenido que usar lentes de contacto por la miopía y astigmatismo que padece, esto ha afectado diferentes aspectos de su vida. Desearía poder disfrutar la vida sin la dependencia de los lentes de contacto, aparte de lo cansado que es su uso, también le resulta es costoso ya que cada seis meses tiene que cambiarlos.
texts.en:
He is a 26 year old young man. He is an electromechanical technician by occupation. He has had to use contact lenses because of the myopia and astigmatism he has had for many years. This has affected different aspects of his life.

He wishes to be able to enjoy life without depending on the use of contact lenses, and he is tired of using them. It is also very expensive because he needs to change them every six months.

loans.use: to pay for ophthalmic treatment.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 54 years old, married, and has four children. Being a single parent providing for the needs of her children, she earns a living through her banana plantation. She plants more bananas and harvests them and sells to the market. 

She aims to increase her income. Because of the increasing price of commodities, she decided to borrow a loan to purchase fertilizer for the banana plantation so that she can produce good quality bananas and can deliver more bananas in the market, which will generate more income. 

Lucy's plan for the future is to save money from her business income to sustain the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her banana plantation

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: ELLA ES UNA SEÑORA QUE ESTA PREOCUPADA POR SU SALUD DENTAL, SUFRE DE FUERTES DOLORES EN SUS  PIEZAS DENTALES Y PRESENTA SEVERA INFECCIÓN.  ES URGENTE QUE SE ATIENDA DE INMEDIATO PARA EVITAR LA PERDIDA DE SUS DIENTES. LAMENTABLEMENTE NO CUENTA CON EL APOYO DE NADIE YA QUE VIVE SOLA.
texts.en:
She is a woman who is worried about her dental health. She suffers from severe pain in her teeth, and she has a severe infection. This urgently needs to be taken care of in order to avoid losing her teeth.

Sadly, she does not have support from anyone because she lives alone.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Thuy's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuy, born in 1975, is a Thai ethnic woman, currently living with her husband and her two sons in Son La city in Son La province. Her family’s main income is from small trade. Her husband is a builder, so the income of the couple is just enough to cover the living expenses of the family and pay their children’s education fees.

She wants to repair her house and pay for the sanitation work, but she does not have enough money to buy materials. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan for this purpose.

She hopes that the loan amount will help her family have better living conditions, and she will work hard to get money to repay the loan to M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to repair her house and pay for the sanitation work.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
